This is a collection of some projects related to machine learning.

* [Unsupervised Genetics](genetics.html) An example of clustering on genetics data.
* [Housing Prices](houses.html) A project to study housing prices.
* [Knoxville Temperature Prediction](knoxvilleTemp.html) Using forecasting to predict the temperature in Knoxville, TN.
* [Topological Data Analysis of Stars](starsTDA.html) Using TDA to study star data.
* [Hardee's and Carl's Jr locations](carls.html) Trying to predict whether a restaurant will be Hardee's or Carl's Jr.
* [Bayesian Linear Regression](BLR.html) An example of Bayesian Linear Regression.
